mode.description: Can be 'speed' or 'quality' (to use heavy algorithms).

smooth.description: Smooths face skin. Contains 2 values of the smoothing strength for corresponding regions: 'whole face' and 'under eyes'.

smokey.description: Smokey eyes index. 0 disables smokey eyes; 1, 2, 3 or 4 selects different set of smokey eyes textures for the first two eyeshadow layers.
